title: Klebsiella pneumoniae-OMVs activate death-signaling pathways in Human Bronchial Epithelial Host Cells (BEAS-2B)

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 8

Author(s): Federica Dell'Annunziata, Elena Ciaglia, Veronica Folliero, Valentina Lopardo, Anna Maciag, Massimiliano Galdiero, Annibale Alessandro Puca, Gianluigi Franci
